short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enjoy Beautiful nature views on your search tab. plus a little surprise to help you wake up when you need to :)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enjoy a beautiful natural view every time you open a new tab.
Raptor search will set the background of your new tab with beautiful nature scenes. Helping you to relax and connect with the wild in a new way every time you open a tab to start a search.

The search bar embedded within the new tab is provided by Bing. It will not make any changes to your browser default search settings.

By installing the Raptor Search extension, you agree to the End User License Agreement and the Privacy Policy elaborated on Raptor search website:

End User License Agreement: https://raptor-search.com/terms
Privacy Policy: https://raptor-search.com/privacy-policy

Oh, and we always make sure to add a little surprise to help get a smile on your face :)

Hope you enjoy and rank us high
